message.content: Yes, the authors do mention the estimated hourly wage paid to participants and the total amount spent on participant compensation. Participants were paid an estimated wage of 15 dollars per hour, and the average experiment completion time was 20 minutes, which was reported in the Appendix J User Study section.
Yes, the authors mention that participants were paid an estimated wage of 15 dollars per hour, and the study took on average 20 minutes to complete.

Yes, the authors mention the estimated hourly wage for participants. They state that participants were paid an estimated wage of 15 dollars per hour, and the average time taken to complete the entire study was 20 minutes. However, they do not provide the total amount spent on participant compensation.
